text: Ezɨ no, nɨ Godɨn gumazimra, nɨ bizir kurar kaba akɨrim ragh dagh asaragh. Egh nɨ arazir aghuibar amuva, guizɨn Godɨn Araziba iniva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨva, igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim ikɨva, arazir tugha gavgavigha osɨmtɨziba bar da ateramim ikɨva, egh gumazibar asughasughamin arazim ikɨ. Nɨ arazir kaba bar pamtem dar suiragh dar gɨn mangɨ.
